column5: I saw you on the T.V. last week.  Great looking Laker, what a great day!
Way to go !  I agree the native fish are beauties and that one is no exception !
Nice laker  fish, especially for that area. good stuff
VERY VERY NICE WELL DONE

Of all the years I have fished Lakers in various Haliburton Lakes this one takes the cake! Not only was a fish big but the colours and condition was prestine! My guests for the day and I had a amazing day catching and releasing lots of Lakers in the 5-17lb range. We were working hard (rock) to mud transistions in 65 to 81' of water using Luhr Jensen Kroc's tipped with minnows and shinners on small gamakatsu hooks. This monster like the others were all released after a quick picture. Best part was that all the fish we caught today were native... the markings and colours were unreal. Here is the biggest of the day.    Take care and Good Fish'n... Greg.
WOW Greg, you're slaying them this year.  Good for you.  What a beaut.  Joey
wicked fish, ur expression tells all, sweet!
Those are some of the finer looking lake trout I've seen.  Thanks for the great photos.
Very nice Greg. Congrats.
Wow!  Great job out there!  Must have been a great feeling landing all those beauties.
beauty Greg! can't wait to head up there in the spring!
Hey Greg,  Now you have me expecting something monstrous on Sunday LOL!!!  Stan
keep em comin greg !
beautiful fish!
Beauty fish. Nice pics too. Thanks for the inspiration.
Man "O" Man that a nice fish, good stuff...
big fish!  nice job!  Cheers!
sweet laker!
YES!YES!YES!
Great Job Like Always Greg  Nice that you always put up Details... Depth, Structure and lures used...  Keep up the great work
Greg Nice Laker for sure kind of reminds me of The North West Territories. Good Job. Cheers Al www.alsadventures.ca
Very nice, still haven't had the chance to fish them through the ice, it's on my list. Nice fish.
from the shoreline i know exactly where u were, i'll be there tomorrow with the crew, just kidding  wow what a beaut, good job
BEAUTY FISH BRO!! CONGRATS!!
now I have to have a drip pan by my computer... Thanks for the useful report and Pics...
Now THAT is a fish that would qualify as a STUNNER!  Beauty pic!
I hope my first one looks like that.Mike
nice fish
Wow those are very impressive fish congrats to you guys. I'd love to tangle with a couple of those.
